backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor defining storage, types, and state for content such as episodes, characters, clans, gallery items, news, scripts, pro blocks, fan mail, and collaboration/support requests.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping new collaboration and support-request features to their related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and key behavior of multiple frontend files including sections, hooks, config, and UI components.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based CSS defining design tokens, theming variables for light and dark mode, and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell that mounts the React app and loads the main entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React app with hash-based routing for main, admin, and pro modes and rendering of all major site sections.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminAcces: Admin gate component handling Internet Identity auth, admin checks, loading states, and unauthorized messaging with principal copying.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminDashb: Renders the admin dashboard with tab navigation to different content management panels.
frontend/src/components/admin/panels/Cha: Provides CRUD UI for characters, including metadata encoding and form dialogs for create and edit.
frontend/src/components/admin/panels/Cla: Offers CRUD management for clans with metadata handling and form dialogs for creation and editing.
frontend/src/components/admin/panels/Col: Displays and sorts collaboration requests with a dialog for viewing request details.
frontend/src/components/admin/panels/Epi: Handles episode creation, editing, reordering, and thumbnail upload with extensive form controls.
frontend/src/components/admin/panels/Fan: Shows fan mail messages, allows replying via dialog, and sorts messages by submission date.
frontend/src/components/admin/panels/Gal: Admin panel for viewing, creating, editing, and deleting gallery items with image upload, metadata handling, and character/clan tagging.
frontend/src/components/admin/panels/New: Admin interface to list, create, edit, and delete news posts with simple title and content fields.
frontend/src/components/admin/panels/Scr: Panel for managing scripts, supporting creation, editing, and deletion with permission-aware error handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/panels/Sup: Displays supporter help requests with sorting, previews, and a dialog for viewing request details.
frontend/src/components/admin/panels/Tea: Admin-only panel for listing team members and granting or revoking user roles via principal IDs.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity, handling authentication state and retry logic.
frontend/src/components/characters/Chara: Displays a character card with animated styling, portrait handling, clan color theming, and character details.
frontend/src/components/characters/Creat: Provides a dialog form for creating a new character, handling validation, metadata encoding, and mutation submission.
Renders a small clan badge with accent color styling and optional pulse animation.
frontend/src/components/clans/ClanCard.t: Shows a detailed animated clan card with sigil, badge, description, and hover effects.
frontend/src/components/episodes/Episode: Displays an episode card showing title, number, status, summary, and optional watch button.
Dialog for viewing an episode’s video or showing a placeholder alert if unavailable.
frontend/src/components/gallery/ArtistLe: Fetches and displays an artist leaderboard with ranks, badges, loading states, and artist detail dialog support.
frontend/src/components/gallery/ArtistPr: Displays a dialog showing an artist’s stats, badges, and artworks with a lightbox for viewing images. Fetches profile data and handles loading, missing data, and image navigation.
frontend/src/components/gallery/GalleryG: Renders a filterable, category-based gallery grid with optional tabs and clickable items that trigger image selection. Supports responsive layouts and hover effects.
frontend/src/components/gallery/GalleryL: Provides a modal lightbox for viewing gallery images with keyboard navigation, next/previous controls, and optional admin deletion. Handles delete confirmations and wraps images in a dialog.
frontend/src/components/gallery/GalleryU: Implements a dialog for uploading gallery images with drag-and-drop, previews, validation, and metadata fields. Submits new artwork via mutations and supports admin and fan submissions.
frontend/src/components/gallery/HallOfFa: Displays curated Hall of Fame entries with featured artwork, achievements, and lightbox viewing. Uses static data and styled cards with hover effects.
frontend/src/components/news/NewPostForm: Form for creating news posts with title and content validation, error display, and submit handling. Uses parent-provided submit logic and disables fields during submission.
frontend/src/components/news/NewsPostCar: Displays a news post card showing title, author, formatted timestamp, and content.
Restricts rendering of children to authenticated admin users and redirects unauthorized users.
frontend/src/components/pro/proPresentat: Encodes and decodes Pro presentation blocks to and from JSON with basic validation.
frontend/src/components/pro/ProPresentat: Loads, displays, and edits Pro presentation blocks with animations and Pro-mode editing controls.
frontend/src/components/pro/proPresentat: Zustand store for managing Pro presentation blocks with add, update, remove, and initialization helpers.
Defines TypeScript interfaces for Pro presentation blocks and document structure.
frontend/src/components/pro/ProToolbar.t: Provides controls to add blocks and save Pro presentation changes with mutation handling and toasts.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: Animated section describing story features with icons and scroll-reveal effects.
frontend/src/components/sections/Charact: Loads, transforms, and displays character data with admin create controls and scroll animations.
frontend/src/components/sections/ClansSe: Fetches and displays elemental clans with styling, fallbacks, animations, and an embedded world map.
frontend/src/components/sections/Collabo: A form component for submitting collaboration requests with validation, mutation handling, and success/error states.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Displays the main contact section with fan mail, contact info, and collaboration/support forms, animated on scroll.
frontend/src/components/sections/Donatio: Renders the donation section with themed visuals and a list of supporter reward tiers.
frontend/src/components/sections/Episode: Loads and displays episodes from the backend, handles errors, and opens a player dialog for released episodes.
frontend/src/components/sections/FanMail: A fan mail submission form with validation, mutation handling, and success/error feedback.
Footer with branding, navigation links, social icons, and scroll-triggered reveal animation.
frontend/src/components/sections/Gallery: Displays gallery items with filtering, sorting, lightbox viewing, and admin upload/delete functionality using backend queries.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeaderN: Renders a responsive navigation bar with scroll effects, smooth section scrolling, mobile menu, and admin link support.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Defines the animated hero section with parallax background, particle effects, and large title content.
frontend/src/components/sections/NewsUpd: Handles fetching, displaying, and creating news posts with authentication, profile setup, and error handling.
frontend/src/components/sections/Support: Implements a supporter help request form with validation, submission via mutation, and success or error feedback.
frontend/src/components/sections/WorldMa: Renders interactive SVG hotspots on a world map, managing refs and keyboard accessibility for location selection.
Displays a dialog showing detailed lore text for a selected world map location with title, region, and close controls.
Renders the world map with animated reveal, clickable hotspots, and a lore dialog that opens on region selection.
frontend/src/data/characters.ts: Defines character data including clan, personality, powers, and roles for multiple story characters.
frontend/src/data/clans.ts: Provides clan definitions with descriptions, colors, glow classes, and sigil image paths.
frontend/src/data/episodes.ts: Lists Season 1 episodes with titles, summaries, status, and optional media URLs.
frontend/src/data/gallery.ts: Defines gallery item structure and category list, with an empty initial gallery array.
frontend/src/data/worldMapLocations.ts: Contains world map location metadata including coordinates, lore text, clan affiliation, and SVG hotspot shapes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, storing identities, and handling login states using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useParallax.ts: Creates a parallax scroll effect on a referenced element with reduced-motion support and performance optimizations.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Detects whether the user prefers reduced motion via a media query and returns a boolean state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for CRUD operations and lookups across user profiles, news, episodes, and other backend entities using an actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useRevealOnScroll.ts: Reveals an element when it enters the viewport using IntersectionObserver, respecting reduced-motion preferences.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining light/dark theme variables, fonts, animations, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/types/fanArtCommunity.ts: Type definitions for fan art community data such as artists, artworks, leaderboards, and hall-of-fame entries.
Encodes and decodes metadata inside text fields for clans, characters, episodes, and gallery items, and provides styling helpers.
frontend/src/utils/galleryImageUpload.ts: Validates uploaded images for type and size and converts them to data URLs, with separate limits for gallery, episode, and character images.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL params (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the URL or storage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, custom colors, radii, shadows, and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Describes project state, requirements, and issues for adding Collaboration and Supporter Help form submissions with backend storage and admin viewing.
